narrative.inOrderTo: communicate effectively to the business some functionality

scenario.title: User account is logged in and logged out
scenario.step: Given I am on Login page
When I am authenticated
Then I am on My Account Dashboard
Then Logging out I return to the Login page

scenario.title: User account can change currency
scenario.step: Given I am on Logged in
When I am at hotels page
Then I change the currency
Then I see prices with the new currency

scenario.title: User can filter search by star grade
scenario.step: Given I am logged in and im on hotels page
When I search hotels by star grade
Then I see only hotels with filtered stars

scenario.title: User can navigate and logout from Invoice menu
scenario.step: Given I am logged in My Account Page
When I open Invoice
Then I click My Account
Then I shoud be able to click Account or Logout buttons

scenario.title: Tours extras should be calculated
scenario.step: Given I am booking Tour
When I select Extras
Then Extras prices are added to the Total amount

scenario.title: User can't log in with valid username and wrong pasword
scenario.step: Given I am on login page
When I enter valid username and wrong password
Then Error is displayed

scenario.title: User can write a review
scenario.step: Given I am on Hotels page
When I enter hotel details
Then I can Write Review

scenario.title: User can change password
scenario.step: Given I am on My Profile page
When I change my password
Then I can log in with the new one
And old password is not valid

scenario.title: User can search Flights
scenario.step: Given I am on Flights page
When I fill search criteria
Then Flights matching the criteria are displayed
